## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G21300](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G21300)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtTRM2a, TRM2a</u>
- **Gene Name:** tRNA methyltransferase 2a
- **Description:**   RNA methyltransferase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
